block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Activated OF B.J. Surhoff from the 15-day disabled list. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed RHP Jason Bere on the 15-day disabled list. SEATTLE MARINERS--Signed OF Bryan Lahair, OF Michael Nesbit, RHP Cordoza Tucker, RHP Michael Moorhead and C Brock Griffin.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Recalled RHP John Patterson from Tucson of the PCL. Placed RHP Brandon Webb on the 15-day disabled list. CINCINNATI REDS--Assigned RHP Brian Reith to Louisville of the IL. Purchased the contract of RHP Joey Hamilton from Louisville. HOUSTON ASTROS--Purchased the contract of RHP Jonathan Johnson from New Orleans of the PCL. Designated INF Tripp Cromer for assignment. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Agreed to terms with LHP Dana Eveland, OF Adam Mannon, RHP Simon Beresford and RHP Tim Dillard. SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS--Activated OF Marvin Benard from the 15-day disabled list. Designated RHP Manny Aybar for assignment.
National Basketball Association NEW ORLEANS HORNETS--Named Allan Bristow assistant general manager.
Continental Basketball Association IDAHO STAMPEDE--Named Larry Krystkowiak coach.
National Football League PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Signed CB Ike Taylor and FB J.T. Wall. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed RB Rashaan Salaam, CB Keith Heyward-Johnson and DE Kai Ellis.
Canadian Football League WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Signed LB Maurice Kelly.

National Hockey League BUFFALO SABRES--Signed Lindy Ruff, coach, to a three-year contract. Signed F Derek Roy and F Chris Thorburn. Declined to tender a contract to F Denis Hamel. CALGARY FLAMES--Signed RW Shean Donovan and RW Chris Clark. COLORADO AVALANCHE--Announced the retirement of G Patrick Roy. DALLAS STARS--Signed LW David Bararuk to a three-year contract. EDMONTON OILERS--Signed D Doug Lynch and F Dan Baum to three-year contracts. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Acquired G Roman Cechmanek from the Philadelphia Flyers for a 2004 second-round draft pick.
